title: Trouble with FontAgent Pro for Windows - Release Candidate 1
content:
I’m hoping some of you out there have been involved in the beta testing of FAP 4 for Windows.

I’ve just installed the RC1 and all went smoothly. EXCEPT now, while correctly listing all my fonts in their various Libraries and Sets, FontAgent Pro shows them ALL as being INactive.

I’m guessing I did not follow some correct order of steps during the install.

Any aid here?

Jim

PS - I had this posted over in “Build” but no one had anything to say.

 [‹ Lakotah Typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145714/http:/typophile.com/node/50400 "Go to previous forum topic") [word spacing in inDesign ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014145714/http:/typophile.com/node/50298 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ShepherdJim

comments.content: You should probably check with the developers considering it’s a Beta software - i.e. a lot of us won’t be using it on our computers due to the possible unstable nature of the software.
